channel.title: Various requests
channel.description:
Okay so i am a total beginner with java but i am experienced in other languages. i have this source called "demise pking v5" And i wanna add Fight pits or duel tournament. Add a rares shop while making various items unspawnable. I know how to edit things and i am not a total dumbass in need for spoon-feeding.
I wanna add chaotics too, how can i see which base "Demise pking v5" is built from?
sorry if this is just too much, you only have to give me some links, i have searched all over
